content.description: Ridiculous and fun, this one is like wrestling an alligator. On the short uphill-most roof (beside Tombstone) look under the roof on the far left side for the claustrophobic jug/slash near the smooth hueco on the neighboring block.Start matched on the slot jug under the roof, toes out on the other side of the roof toe-hooking the outer lip. Blast out and right to the enormous sloper lip. Negotiate the slopers and turn back around to mantle through the groove.

On the lower downstream-most end on the block's opposite end from Wrecking Ball.Look under the very low roof for the smooth, rounded mid-roof crimp. Start left hand on that crimp, right hand out of the side of the roof and the furthest-back round sloper. Duel toe-hooks directly out of the opposite side of the boulder.Work out the roof past more slopers to the pointed nose. Overcome the bulge nose and top out.
Long, smooth, skinny boulder with two very low and very tricky roofs on either end. This one touches the side of Tombstone Block. Only a couple pads are needed for either roof line.
